column4: Hey, i cannot grant anything in MySQL with my user, but it is the main user - debian-sys-maint which is auto-created when installed. Whats the problem? :(
debian-sys-maint is NOT the main user
root with no password from localhost
i installed it using apt-get install mysql
if root has a password now, you have set one
i installed it using apt-get install
u think im hacker or something?
i installed it using apt-get install mysql
